documents.document: @NiallOK I'm only up the road in Cabra. I never remember to rub an ice cube on skin when I get a burn.
@NiallOK Where do you live? I have a huge aloe vera plant (this is not a euphanism).
@DebraMessing Every yr the Irish prime minister visits the White House on 17 March. Calls for him not to this yr https://t.co/lCjBu2ytqi
Ever thought about pet fostering? https://t.co/8xsdu7Xnb0 is always on the look-out for new fosterers. The joy of a cat without commitment
@IrishRail Taking a journey from Broombridge. How do I pay? Have you installed Leap readers since my last visit
@BBClamacqshow Up the Hill Backwards by David Bowie. Cheers from Dublin.
Look what arrived on Australia day! #grantandi #go-betweens @RobertForster3 https://t.co/rk4aotKJkm
@IanDempsey Love the Cult! This girl has class. More Cult daily please
Love this. From Montreal, Come by She-Devils https://t.co/F3EnUhkXwt
@8RadioIreland Flipping fantastic to hear Auto Da Fe on the radio!
@OldeEire I learned about disc damage on a first aid course. Can't imagine the pain. No disco dancing for you!
@OldeEire It surely is. I've had a cold since September
I've spent the day contemplating something positive. Here's a pic of my fab new leopard print socks https://t.co/vmnopSG7DR
@PMcLoone Definitely time for Ant Music by Adam and the Ants
@dublinbusnews I got a 38A in Phibsborough that wasn't listed on any Real Time. #surrealtime
@dublinbusnews Thanks. Stop no.80 says 43 mins for 122. Real Time Info is seriously screwed. #scifi
@dublinbusnews At stop no.77 and it's 54 mins for a 122. What's going on? This is Cabra, not Navan
Boo, new foster kitten. This super friendly purr machine will be up for adoption soon… https://t.co/EuXaCu5zkk
@fobraonain Fantastic start to the show! Stars of Heaven are my favourite Irish band. Eat your orange or your cake...
@PMcLoone Sadly my fave song of all time was used in a car ad, Wide Open Road by the Triffids
I'm selling a futon. Open to offers. https://t.co/XTs1udI4pC
@UlsterBank_Help I'm not remotely patient, I'm very annoyed, so no need to thank me.
@UlsterBank_Help So this is what I pay a tenner a month for? Thanks lads #massivefail
@fobraonain It's QUITE SOME TIME since Iast heard Decadent Days! Loving it.
@PMcLoone You probably have playlist for tonight complete, hope this is on it, love it. https://t.co/UOPARnKVQG
@AlisonTodayFM Try stemless glasses. I use some tumblers from tesco. Cheap and long-lasting and Spanish stylee!
@JasonBarry_ I took that photo! Nice to see it again.
@NadineORegan Loving the choices of @davidmcw so far! #disco #partyinmykitchen
I'll be on @8RadioIreland at 2.30 this afternoon. Give me a shout if you'd like to hear anything in particular
@sjfanning Grass is it exactly. But I'd reached a point where I was prepared to try anything to make my immune system stronger
Looking to adopt kittens? I'm fostering these 2 dotes, they have become fab little chaps since I got them https://t.co/3uOClO5Dv8
My Christmas habit of a daily Irish coffee has been replaced by matcha tea. It's VILE. But I've been ill and read i… https://t.co/vrmjcbuj4p
@AlisonTodayFM My fella Grizzley Adams chops up the Christmas tree every yr. Great burning! Just make sure to use a fireguard
Send help: what's there to do of a Thurs night in Achill sound? It's as dead as heaven on a Saturday night
I'm looking for a pub quiz during the first week of January. If you know of one please let me know. Dublin area.
@DaraghBroph RECOVERY! Ireland is in recovery! (Not for me anyway)
Wham! ticket, my 1st ever gig. RDS. https://t.co/HKAprpT89H
Wham! In the RDS was my 1st ever gig. RIP George Michael
@cerysmatthews Here's the phonetic pronunciation : Nullig Shunna Dit
@EmerTheScreamer I feel your pain, I got my festive dose. But it won't stop me hitting Hogans later!
@BBCRadMac Beat this: we have a Barak Obama service station https://t.co/2wNN7xlc1U
Old Toy Trains https://t.co/cjocFyNpBG @martylyricfm Any chance of this? Never gets played at Chr...
@todayfm Lads, so much auto-tune in the mornings. My ears hurt! #toooldfortodayfm
@mistereatgalway @FSAIinfo I spoke to them at a food fair. It's packed in Belgium, made here. No equipment in this country for shape
I'll be on @8RadioIreland at 2pm today. 94.3fm in Dublin, or online at https://t.co/6INhq92WuH
@ben_watt Thanks! Will do. Really enjoyed gg in @whelanslive recently
@ben_watt Any sign of your website coming back? Bought Hendra on vinyl and want digital version. New record player not coming until Jan
I'll be on @8RadioIreland tomorrow at 2pm, 94.3fm in Dublin. There will be Blue Nile for sure.
Blue Nile fans take note! Great radio doc by @KenSweeney #insearchofthebluenile https://t.co/xXGEFqTEeZ
@SaturdayKitchen I love an Irish accent on the show! #paddytakeover
A new one to me, Christmas in February by Lou Reed. Thank you @8RadioIreland ! #feelingfestive
@martylyricfm It's not Ch*** until I've heard Dan Fogleberg. Pls hurry! In work at 8.30
Inspectors on the 38 leaving city for Blanch. 3 of them. #ticketalert
@makeupmonster_ @mufeireland I'd love to win. I nominate my friend Louise K.
2pm today I'll be on the fab @8RadioIreland. Shout now for a request
Looking forward to playing great tunes on @8RadioIreland tomorrow (Sun) at 2pm
Funny how the studio audience of the #LateLateShow is mostly female but guests are mostly male #wherearethewomen
@8RadioIreland Omigod it's amazing how a song can take you back! Love Engine Alley
@MissusVee That's one of the funniest things I've seen on twitter in ages!
Selling a lampshade, genuine #NormannCopenhagan Bought in Brown Thomas https://t.co/0Lzk03woVR
@urchinette I know you love cats *and* magazines. Are you subscribing to Puss Puss? https://t.co/Q6NEr1lmyA
Tempted to go to the pub. #powercut #dublin7
Power cut in Cabra. Anywhere else? #powerout

New York at end of Dec for a short break. Will I freeze my ass off? Anything open?
@antodarcy1 Thanks a million!
@daveGildedALM @thedraysmusic @8RadioIreland One of my favourite Irish bands, going back a long time!
Looking forward to playing tunes on 94.3fm https://t.co/6INhq92WuH, 2pm. Hit me with your requests. @8RadioIreland
@8RadioIreland Any Teenage Fanclub for everyone going to the gig later?
@CineramaGav You might enjoy it! I'm not a huge fan, but Hairspray was great a few years back in the West End.
https://t.co/sThrJCJoaf is on the FM this w/end! Tune in now for your drive-time commute. 94.3fm in Dublin. I'll be on tomorrow at 2pm
@BBCRadMac "Laois" is pronounced Leesh. Cheers from Dublin!
@PMcLoone Any Ivor Cutler? Can email. And Aztec Camera. And Camera Obscura
@BBClamacqshow Thanks for being such a great supporter of Irish music ! #powerofdreams

@NiallCrumlish I'm with your daughter! #timedoesntstandstill
@Aircoach I guess the 3 hrs from Dub to Cork as listed on your site is subject to change? Another 40 mins according to Google maps
@AlisonTodayFM I had never heard of it until recently. Think I'm a bit past appreciating it at this stage
@barbarascully Of course! Up to 48 hrs is fine
@salihughes Welcome to Dublin!
I made this for @last tv which was a great show on RTE 2. Finally got it transferred from VHS tape to dvd. https://t.co/nvNw4hF0eh

@johncreedon Heading to Cork city for the w/end. Any top tips? Is the Hi Be still there?
@BBClamacqshow It's only now I appreciate that song by the Saw Doctors. Great to hear it again. Hi from Dublin
@HelenORahilly I've heard that song a million times this year and still not sick of it #tilted
@8RadioIreland Pink Frost by the Chills. Hi to Garret and Pablo in D7
Heartbreaking to hear neighbour's dog barking on a night this cold. I'd bark too if it was me! #AnimalCruelty #dublin7
It's freezing. @wigwamdublin https://t.co/aXu4L7xttJ

@muloc2016 Hope you caught Cattle and Cane
@graywaster I am! Today at 4pm for 2 hrs
Catch me on @8RadioIreland from 4 till 6 today. Only ever great songs
@fobraonain I had Dessert Boots on single! Great to hear it again
